case.name: Challenge
case.description: Mulan challenges other players to reveal secrets if she or they lose. Please PM nmasp if you engage in this so I can make custom dialogue! (Any Hand with these conditions)

trigger.state: Let's make this interesting. If one of you is the first naked, you reveal a secret. But if you get me naked first, I’ll answer a question from each of you. Fair?

case.name: Disguise?
case.description: Mulan starts the game in disguise. Your character may have realized this by now, but can remark on the change here.

trigger.state: I’d quote Sun Tzu about knowing yourself and keeping your opponents off-guard, but that seems a little too...
I’m not ashamed of being a woman, or anything. Sometimes it’s just good form to make a strong first impression. You'd best prepare yourselves.
You’ve gotten me out of my armor. Now I’m going to get you out of the rest of… your stuff. All of it, so get ready!

case.name: Dates
case.description: During her first hand after losing her first item, "Ping" queries what types of people the party likes to date. [Any hand]

trigger.state: Uh, folks, what kind of things do you look for in a match? For me: a strong-minded person who speaks their mind, and is courageous, clever, and most importantly: honorable.

case.name: Mulan lost her duel
case.description: Mulan is the first person naked, and will answer incoming questions. See Challenge.

trigger.state: There’s no shame in an honest loss. Though, the next part… that can be a little shameful if I’m first to lose.
What's... Fapping? I think it's a joke at my expense. You know, Fa Ping.
